data.comment: The match is underway at Allianz Stadium.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Cagliari.
In the minute 1, Fabio Maresca awards Juventus a goal kick.
Throw-in Cagliari.
Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juventus's half?
In the minute 5, In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fabio Maresca awards the away team a throw-in.
Fabio Maresca signals a Juventus throw-in in Cagliari's half.
In the minute 11, Juventus drive forward but Alvaro Morata is judged offside.
Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juventus drives forward and Adrien Rabiot gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 16, Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Federico Bernardeschi of Juventus gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Cagliari needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Juventus.
Throw-in for Juventus close to the penalty box.
In the minute 23, Juventus push forward at Allianz Stadium and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cagliari defence.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In Turin, Dejan Kulusevski of Juventus is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 26, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Alvaro Morata (Juventus) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Cagliari.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Cagliari.
Juventus are coming forward and Dejan Kulusevski gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 29, Cagliari have a goal kick.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Cagliari.
Throw-in for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 33, At Allianz Stadium, Adrien Rabiot has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Juventus are in shooting range from this free kick.
Cagliari's Alessandro Tripaldelli has been booked in Turin.
In the minute 37, Federico Bernardeschi of Juventus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Cristiano Ronaldo.
Alvaro Morata with an assist there.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Turin Cagliari attack through Ragnar Klavan. The finish is off target, however.
Fabio Maresca awards Juventus a goal kick.
Important block from the Cagliari defence as Dejan Kulusevski fires in a strike for Juventus.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 42, Goal! Juventus extend their lead to 2-0 through Cristiano Ronaldo.
Merih Demiral instrumental with a fine assist.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Allianz Stadium.
The second half has started at Allianz Stadium.
Eusebio Di Francesco is making the team's first substitution at Allianz Stadium with Riccardo Sottil replacing Alessandro Tripaldelli.
In the minute 47, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Juventus are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 49, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Cagliari.
In the minute 53, Juventus push forward at Allianz Stadium and Juan Cuadrado gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cagliari defence.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Merih Demiral (Juventus) powers in a header â€“ against the bar!
In the minute 53, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Danilo (Juventus) has received a yellow card from Fabio Maresca.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Arthur for Juventus has been booked by Fabio Maresca and receives a first yellow card.
Adam Ounas (Cagliari) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 56, Juventus's Federico Bernardeschi is on target but unsuccessful.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 57, Razvan Marin for Cagliari gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 58, Fabio Maresca signals a Juventus throw-in in Cagliari's half.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Juventus have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Cagliari's Marko Rog breaks free at Allianz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Fabio Maresca awards Juventus a goal kick.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus are pushing forward but Alvaro Morata's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
In the minute 67, Razvan Marin for Cagliari is whistled offside.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Ragnar Klavan is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 69, Paulo Dybala is replacing Alvaro Morata for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
The home team have replaced Adrien Rabiot with Weston McKennie. This is the second substitution made today by Andrea Pirlo.
Ragnar Klavan (Cagliari) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Andrea Carboni.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
In the minute 71, Fabrizio Caligara is replacing Razvan Marin for the away team.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
At Allianz Stadium, Riccardo Sottil has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Juventus pushes forward through Paulo Dybala, whose finish on goal is saved.
Important block from the Cagliari defence as Dejan Kulusevski fires in a strike for Juventus.
Free kick Cagliari.
In the minute 77, Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Juventus's Weston McKennie misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Cagliari make their fourth substitution with Leonardo Pavoletti replacing Giovanni Simeone.
In the minute 81, Eusebio Di Francesco (Cagliari) is making a fifth substitution, with Christian Oliva replacing Adam Ounas.
Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
Fabio Maresca signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Juventus's area.
In the minute 85, Andrea Pirlo is making the team's third substitution at Allianz Stadium with Rodrigo Bentancur replacing Arthur.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Paulo Dybala of Juventus gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Federico Chiesa is on a sub for Dejan Kulusevski for Juventus.
The home team replace Danilo with Alex Sandro.
In the minute 88, Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus drive upfield and Paulo Dybala gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Cagliari.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Fabio Maresca signals a Cagliari throw-in in Juventus's half.
Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Juventus.
Federico Bernardeschi of Juventus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
